metadata.title: CVE-2022-48799 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  perf: Fix list corruption in perf_cgroup_switch()  There's list corruption on cgrp_cpuctx_list. This happens on the following path:    perf_cgroup_switch: list_for_each_entry(cgrp_cpuctx_list)       cpu_ctx_sched_in          ctx_sched_in             ctx_pinned_sched_in               merge_sched_in                   perf_cgroup_event_disable: remove the event from the list  Use list_for_each_entry_safe() to allow removing an entry during iteration.
